name: The Walls are Changing
description:
Don't worry about checking your headphones, I didn't have time to add any sound.

Known Bugs:

  • Some Invisible Walls
  • Power ups activating before entering the room or even being adjacent to them
The Walls are Changing!

The Walls are Changing is a dungeon shooter where you go from chamber to chamber defeating enemies. You can also join chambers together to help you navigate or to give you power ups.

How to Win

Defeat all the enemies in a chamber to clear it.

Clear all 30 rooms to win. (There is no win state but if you die it will tell you how many chambers you cleared)

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Space to Dash

Aim with Mouse and Left Click to Shoot

Right Click to Zoom out

While Zoomed out, Left Click to Drag green chambers

Powers

Certain powers are activated when you are in a room adjacent to them. You should position them next to the room you are about to fight to get their benefit.

Other powers are activated by stepping on their symbol. You should visit them after clearing a room.
